title: runtime: runtime-gdb.py can't handle new DWARF info. generated for maps
body:
main.M is map[string]int.

(gdb) p 'main.M'
$1 = (map[string]int) 0xc20004d210
(gdb) p *'main.M'
$2 = Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py", line 87, in children
    stab = self.val['st']
gdb.error: There is no member named st.
struct hash<string,int>
